wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry Francis Howard  (3 November 1809 – 28 January 1898) was a British diplomat who was envoy to several countries.

response: *Henry Francis Howard (1809–1898), British diplomat, minister to several countries

List of diplomats of the United Kingdom to Hanover

response: Howard was a younger son of the diplomat Sir Henry Francis Howard (1809–1898) by his second wife Baroness Marie Ernestine von der Schulenburg. Through his father he was a descendant of the Howard Dukes of Norfolk. His brother was another diplomat, Sir Henry Howard (1843–1921).Sir Francis Howard The Peerage.com

Henry Howard was the elder son of Sir Henry Francis Howard, also a British diplomat and ambassador, through whom he was a descendant of Lord William Howard, younger son of Thomas Howard, 4th Duke of Norfolk.Sir Henry Howard – thepeerage.com He was a member of the Howard family, a Roman Catholic, and was educated at Downside School.British Mission to the Pope, The Times, 12 December 1914, page 9

* Henry Francis Howard (1809–1898), a diplomat who married the Hon. Sevilla Erskine, daughter of David Erskine, 2nd Baron Erskine. After her death in 1835, he married Marie Ernestine von der Schulenburg in 1841.
